name: nerp
description: ``` wget https://download.elasticsearch.org/elasticsearch/elasticsearch/elasticsearch-1.4.1.noarch.rpm # download elasticsearch sudo yum localinstall elasticsearch-*.rpm # install elasticsearch sudo service elasticsearch start # start elasticsearch service sudo chkconfig elasticsearch on # enable elasticsearch service on system startup virtualenv env # create a virtual environment source env/bin/activate # Enter the virtual environment git clone git@github.com:awecode/nerp.git app # git clone the repo cd app # cd to project dir export DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE=app.settings pip install -r requirements/development.txt # install Python packages required for development cp app/local_settings.sample.py app/local_settings.py # create local settings file from sample file vi app/local_settings.py # configure your settings here, database, static & media paths and urls ./manage.py migrate # synchronize database and run migrations ./manage.py loaddata groups # install default groups ./manage.py loaddata users # install admin user ./manage.py collectstatic # collect static files ```
